players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Charlie was the one who was found dead during the night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and work together to uncover the truth behind this."
Bob: "I agree with Alice. We should keep a close eye on each other and work together to uncover the truth behind Charlie's death."
Diana: "I believe we should focus on identifying the murderer among us. Let's share any suspicious actions or observations we've had since the start of the game."

You: "Based on the information we've shared, I believe it's important that we pay extra attention to any unusual behavior or actions from the mafioso among us. Let's continue working together and sharing any suspicions we may have."

Bob: "I think we should all focus on identifying the murderer among us. I have been observing Diana closely, and she seemed very calm and collected during the discussion about Charlie's death. This could be a sign of guilt or it could mean nothing at all. We..."
